sentences.sContent: Several countries embargoed arms shipments to Yugoslavia.
sentences.sCn: 好几个国家对南斯拉夫实行武器禁运。

remMethod.val: em(拿) + bar(阻挡) + go → 阻拦， 不让拿 → 禁运

trans.tranCn: 禁止出入港口；禁止或限制贸易；征用或扣押
trans.tranOther: to officially stop particular goods being traded with another country
an official order to stop trade with another country
